name: Svualizer
description:
ATTENTION! A game-breaking bug was discovered in the new update! It is now fixed, so if you have the glitched version you need to redownload!

Svualizer is a simple music-based dodge-the-bullets game designed for casual gamers. Click or press any key to switch directions. Avoid the bullets. That's it!

MacOS version is sadly unavailable for now, as there have been reports of it not working. :(

CHANGELOG v1.1.2:
-Fixed a game-breaking bug that destroyed v1.1.1, you know, average update. XD

CHANGELOG v1.1.1:
-Added customization to the marathons... I mean... what marathons? They definitely aren't unlocked when you click "More Coming Soon" in the level select... That'd be crazy! 😅
-Customization includes:
--Select which of the levels you want to play rather than having to play them all... I mean... Play them all? That's... funny... I meant play one of them!
--Customize the health you start with to increase difficulty.
--Two separate health values for easy levels and hard levels. (Currently the only "hard" level is Cloud Chaser.)

GAMEPLAY:
